channel.title: serverless on lackful.com
channel.description: Recent content in serverless on lackful.com

item.title: Cloudflare Pages Migration
item.author: josh@nullidle.com (Joshua Marcum)
item.description: We moved. Oh, you didn’t notice? Good! That’s how it should work. Cloudflare now serves the site content from your closest available source. What this means? Faster load times, creating a better user experience. There are some other improvements as well. The site is statically generated, this means improved SEO, less vulnerable to compromise, no infrastructure costs.
